abstract: The mystery is why so many wealthy people handed over so much money with so little due diligence.
snippet: The mystery is why so many wealthy people handed over so much money with so little due diligence.
lead_paragraph: Bernard L. Madoff, the Cheshire cat of financial swindlers, did what advisers to the very rich only dream about: he persuaded them to hand over a huge percentage of their net worth with less due diligence than they would do before purchasing a launch for their yacht.

headline.main: The Rules That Madoff’s Investors Ignored
headline.print_headline: The Rules That Madoff’s Investors Ignored
